title: Virgin Islands National Park: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends       The “Friends of Virgin Islands National Park” has become a valuable private sector partner to Virgin Islands National Park. The Friends provide beneficial assistance by financially supporting educational programs, cultural and historic research, and various resource protection activities in the Park. To become involved, please contact the Friends at (340) 779-4940, or visit their website at www.friendsvinp.org for more information.
